casebody.data:
WILLIAM V. BROKAW, et al., Respondents, v. ANNA A. WALTON, Appellant.

Before Curtis, Ch. J., and Freedman, J.

Decided June 18, 1880. Appeal from an order denying a. motion to set aside an inquest, and open a judgment entered thereon. G. B. Ely, for appellant. G. H. Crawford, for respondents. Per Curiam.

Upon the whole case no sufficient reason appears which calls for a reversal.

The order should be affirmed, with casts.
